benefits.title: Sube tu información fácil
benefits.subTitle: Crea
benefits.description: Te presentamos la nueva forma de estudiar con resúmenes generados por la IA, cuestionarios lúdicos y asistentes virtuales.

subBenefits.title: Fast
subBenefits.description: Consistently come up with new ideas and inspiration, while saving time and effort.

subBenefits.title: Flexible
subBenefits.description: Upload files like PDFs, DOCs, and PPTs to create quizzes and exams.

subBenefits.title: Integrated
subBenefits.description: Flashcards in a single click. Quizgecko can even generate entire quizzes from Youtube videos.

benefits.title: Publish with ease
benefits.subTitle: Share & Embed
benefits.description: Effortlessly share and embed quizzes with your team, students, or use them as study aids – get everyone engaged and enhance learning experiences in just seconds.

subBenefits.title: Share
subBenefits.description: Share quizzes effortlessly with students or colleagues.

subBenefits.title: Export
subBenefits.description: Download as text, csv and Aiken format for seamless integration into your learning management system or classroom setting.

subBenefits.title: Embed
subBenefits.description: Add quizzes in your own website, LMS or blog. Perfect for lead generation, engaging your users.

benefits.title: Measure performance
benefits.subTitle: Analyze
benefits.description: Reports and stats to understand how individuals and groups performed. Auto-graded quizzes make marking a thing of the past.

subBenefits.title: Auto Grading
subBenefits.description: Intelligently evaluates and grades short answer questions, going the extra mile by offering valuable suggestions on how to improve and attain higher scores.
